business: Control the weather for its clients, but at a considerable price.
Fly airships and steer sea galleon transports.
characteristics: Ambitious and often acts in what it sees as the interests of all half-elves
Lyrandar heirs have been helping the Valenar elves run their young kingdom
prompts: Are you a part of House Lyrandar? If so, do you bear the Mark of Storm? Or do you bear the Mark without being a member of the House?
If you are in the house, what is your role? What is your opinion of the House?
Where you exiled from your house?
How do you use your mark if you have one?
Are you an airship pilot or galleon captain?
Do you seek to help other half-elves find a place in Khorvaire?
Do you help Valenar establish themselves as a nation?
racePrompts: Where you parents born in a Khoravar (Half-Elf) community, or were they members of different races?
Is your half-elf identity a source of pride, a simple fact of life, or something that has been difficult for you?
Are you a part of the detective House of Medani or bear the Mark of Detection?
Are you a part of the transportation House of Lyrandar or bear the Mark of Storm?
